about_the_game:
Over 40 radical cinematic wallpapers from Outmode in 1920x1080 png.


Featuring the cars and environments from the game!

Also includes a content pack which contains Outmode's banner art, title logo and icon logo in full res.

Perfect for desktop backgrounds or to include in your own content creation!

(Full permission use granted)

Purchasing also helps me as a dev to make more awesome stuff going forward!

Wallpapers located at: Steam\steamapps\common\Outmode\Wallpapers
Content Pack located at: Steam\steamapps\common\Outmode\ContentAssets

name: Outmode - Wallpaper Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Storage: 91 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: As long as your machine can open a png file at 1080p you're good.

short_description: 40 cinematic wallpapers from the Outmode universe featuring the best of the retro action. Also includes a mini content pack.
